Class Money

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.Money

  • public class Money
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tries to accomplish Rule 3 - Wrap all primitives and Strings by putting money amount into a Money object.
    Since:
    2015-11-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Keira Zhou
